title: Output Schema for Update List Operation
description: Output schema for the update list operation in the connector.

id.description: The unique identifier of the list.

displayName.description: The updated display name of the list.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the list was originally created.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the list was last modified.

webUrl.description: The URL for the list on the SharePoint site.

template.description: The template type for the list (e.g., 'genericList').
